body_html:
Also please upload the entire log to website such as the following, and paste the link here.

http://pastebin.com/

As @jmchen-g mentioned, it is better to have a small repro case. Otherwise, it might be expected to fail if the model requests more memory than what the GPU has.

body:
Also please upload the entire log to website such as the following, and paste the link here. 

http://pastebin.com/

As @jmchen-g mentioned, it is better to have a small repro case. Otherwise, it might be expected to fail if the model requests more memory than what the GPU has.
